pages.text: Converts $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$(/l) into pure $(l:magic/ink)Ink$(), which you can supply to your magical items.$(br)Used to fill Ink Containers, like $(l:magic/ink_flask)Ink Flasks$().$(br)Unfortunately - $(l:magic/ink#transfer)you remember how Ink is transferred$() - there is always residue left behind. You can't use the full amount, though the transfer is quicker the bigger the difference.

pages.text: $(italic)Never develop a passion you can't afford. It'll eat your heart away like a bookworm.
